data.enText: sympathy that you feel for sb when a person in their family or that they know well has died; an expression of this sympathy

data.chText: 向他的妻子和家人谨致吊慰之意。
data.enText: Our condolences go to his wife and family.

simple_means.memory_skill: con 共同 + dol 悲伤 + ence 表行为，condole的名词 → 哀悼

tr: an expression of sympathy with another's grief

value.def: A message of condolence is a message in which you express your sympathy for someone because one of their friends or relatives has died recently.

example.ex: Neil sent him a letter of condolence.
example.tran: 尼尔给他发了一封唁函。

value.def: When you offer or express your condolences to someone, you express your sympathy for them because one of their friends or relatives has died recently.

example.ex: He expressed his condolences to the families of the people who died in the incident.
example.tran: 他向这次事件中的死者家属表示了慰唁。

partsOfSpeech.dec: con 共同 + dole 悲伤 → 共同悲伤 → 哀悼
con 共同 + dol 悲伤 + ence 表行为，condole的名词 → 哀悼
dole 悲伤 + ful …的 → 悲伤的
dole 悲伤 + some 充满…的 → 悲哀的
dol 悲伤 + or 状态 + ous …的 → 忧伤的
in 不 + dol 悲伤 + ence 性质，状态，行为 → 懒惰
